phrases: Gustave Marlowe?
Yes.
I am told that the man from last night is an internationally-wanted criminal.
He is a member of the group behind Jade Dusk,
a terrorist plot carried out in Asterisk.
You mean he is a terrorist?
No.
He seems to have joined Jade Dusk for monetary reasons.
Most likely, there was nothing political about his motives last night.
It did sound like he was carrying out someone is request,
so maybe a big organization's behind this?
But still, why would anyone make such a request?
The police want to put you under protection.
What do you want to do?
I think I will pass.
I will be all right, too.
Looks like none of us will be needing protection.
Understood.
I will let them know.
Now then, I have some research to do, so please excuse me.
If that is all, then we will be leaving, too.
Oh, one second, Julis...
Can you and Amagiri stay a second?
Did not I tell you yesterday there was something I wanted to discuss?
The Lonely Strega
So...
what did you want to talk about?
Right.
There are two things, actually...
Amagiri?
Yes?
Would you mind marrying Julis?
Wh-Wh...?
What are you talking about, Brother?!
What kind of a sick joke is that?!
Well, how about if you started out by getting engaged?
N-No, wait!
I think you have the wrong idea about us!
Julis and I do not have that kind of relationship.
R-Right!
Oh, sure, I have heard all about your relationship from Flora.
But it does not matter.
Under these circumstances, it is not that big a deal.
It is a huge deal!
I am saying this for your sake, Julis.
At this rate, you are going to end up...
That is none of your business!
What is this all about?
If we do not act now, Julis will end up like me.
That is, married off to someone convenient for the Integrated Enterprise Foundation.
In that case,
you should at least pick someone you get along with now, while you can.
You do not dislike Amagiri, right?
Well...
Needless to say, I do not dislike him, but...
Do not tell me you forced that victory parade on us yesterday so...
Yes.
I thought I should introduce you two in a casual way.
B-B-But why all of a sudden?
When I have always turned you down for such things!
The situation's changed now, Julis.
Because you have won the Phoenix Festa.
Until now, the Integrated Enterprise Foundation was not all that serious.
But thanks to your recent victory, your value has skyrocketed.
W-Well...
But we can still strike first now.
Nothing can top his status as your partner in the Phoenix Festa.
So what do you say, Amagiri?
It is a small nation, but I am sure you can live quite comfortably here.
I do not think it is a bad proposition.
True.
But at the same time, there would always be certain strings attached.
Am I wrong about that?
As long as you live in this world, you can never expect complete freedom.
I think you have no choice but to accept some kind of constraint or other.
You should be able to choose what kind of constraints you are going to accept.
After all, Julis came to Asterisk to break those constraints.
I cannot allow myself to be the shackles that bind Julis.
You are more serious than I thought.
Fine, fine.
Let us forget we ever spoke of this.
Oh, but if, for some reason...
Yes?
If it turns out that Julis herself desires such shackles,
will you accept her wishes then?
B-B-Brother, what are you...?
Well...
I cannot say until it actually happens.
I see.
So there is a chance.
If that is all, please excuse us!
Let us go, Ayato!
Hold up a second.
Did not I say there were two things?
If it is something stupid again, I will not let you get away with it!
It will not take a second.
Julis,
would you mind not competing in the Gryps Festa?
Are you being serious, Brother?
Naturally, I am totally serious.
And your reasons?
You saw it during the victory parade, did not you?
Right now your popularity is mind-blowing.
If you reach even greater heights, you could drive me into irrelevance.
And so I would like you to stay out of the Gryps Festa.
Declined.
What am I going to do?
You are not serious, are you?
Totally serious, that was me begging with all of my heart.
I am on the throne in this kingdom
because I am obedient to the Integrated Enterprise Foundation,
and I am a good-for-nothing with no interest in politics.
If Julis were to win the Gryps Festa
and ended up wielding more influence than me,
then I would not put it past them to put Julis on the throne.
And then she would try to change this country to help the poor.
But this country is controlled by the Integrated Enterprise Foundation.
Julis would only end up suffering.
Now, then, Amagiri...
I am going to ask you again.
Do you think you can find a way to persuade Julis?
No, I cannot.
I see.
All right, then.
Oh, well.
Then I will have to be an even bigger good-for-nothing than I already am.
You will find Julis at the orphanage across the lake.
Ever since she was a child, she is always gone there whenever she was upset.
Sorry, but I am leaving her to you.
Yes, that is right.
Please do it as quickly as possible.
You got it!
Okay, I will let you know as soon as I find out.
Later.
All right!
Come at me from any direction!
Hey, now you have done it!
Hey, look out!
It is Ayato Amagiri!
- You are right!
- Wow!
You got here faster than I thought.
Did my brother tell you where I was?
Well, yeah.
Oh, my!
Sister Therese...
I am Therese.
I am in charge of this church and the orphanage.
I saw the Phoenix Festa.
Not bad!
Well, what did you expect?
Hey, pretty cocky!
What happened to that kid who used to snivel 24/7?
- There she is! - There she is!
Long time no see, Julis!
Time really flies, does not it?
Our little Julis grew up into a fine young princess in the blink of an eye!
Well, I do not know about princesses who end up winning the Phoenix Festa.
What did you say?
I am so glad.
That Julis chose a person like you.
Hey, hey, never mind that.
Is that her partner?
Oh, hey, I am not...
He is pretty hot!
Hey, you are right!
It is all right.
You need to tell us all about him!
I can tell just by the way you looked at Julis now.
Oh, please, there is nothing to tell!
All right, enough!
Go on back to work now!
Yes, madam!
- See you, Julis! - See you!
See you!
Bye!
Let us ask her again later.
Absolutely!
I know we caused you a lot of trouble over that incident with Flora.
Once again, thank you very much.
Oh, but it actually was not me who saved Flora.
Just go ahead and accept her thanks on behalf of the group.
Right...
Thank you.
I see that there are some Genestella members among the sisters here.
Yes, including myself, there are four of us now.
For me, Sister Therese is my Strega mentor.
Yeah?
I still teach self-defense to the children.
Is that a greenhouse?
Yes.
It was the favorite spot of one of the girls who used to live here.
She did not like fighting...
and she was a truly kind-hearted girl.
I think I will go get some air.
Julis?
YOU-Uh, sorry!
Excuse me.
I see it is still too soon for her.
I am sorry.
I seem to be rather unstable today.
Jolbert seemed really worried about you.
I know that.
I know!
That my brother cares for me more than anyone else in the world
and how blessed I am.
That is precisely why I cannot accept this country's condition.
I think you are doing the best that you can, Julis.
That orphanage has nothing to worry about anymore, does it?
It is true that by winning the Phoenix Festa,
I have attained my goal of rescuing that orphanage.
But it is just a drop in the bucket.
At the end of the day,
the system this world is built on
just keeps churning out more and more slums like this.
Places like that orphanage...
And children who have no choice but to cling to them.
I want to free this country, at least, of that curse.
Is that your wish for the next Gryps Festa?
Yes.
Do not tell me that was...
No way!
Julis?
No, there is no doubt about it.
I am sure it was...
Hey, Julis!
What is up with that all of a sudden?
Julis!
Is the ground rotten?
It is been a long time, Ophelia.
Ophelia?
Surely you do not mean...
Why did you come here?
What is it been, about a year?
I never thought I would run into you here.
How many times did I warn you not to concern yourself with me?
My business with you is the same as it was a year ago.
Come back, Ophelia!
That is not the world you belong in!
Stop it, Julis.
I am only following my own destiny.
You do not have the power to reverse my fate.
I do not buy that at all!
At this time, my destiny is here.
If you insist on making me do as you say, then...
Oh, you do not have to tell me!
But do not think it is going to end the way it did a year ago!
H-Hey, hold up, Julis!
Ayato, do not you lift a finger!
This is between me and Ophelia!
Julis...
This time for sure, I am going to smash that school badge!
Burst into bloom...
Livingstone Daisy!
So that is that power of Ophelia Landlufen.
Oh, Julis.
It is no good.
Once again, you are in over your head.
I am not done yet!
Burst into bloom...
Anemone Coronaria!
Let us go, Ophelia!
She is not actually... blocking it with just her Prana?
Impossible!
Your destiny is weak.
Did not I tell you?
Turn... to... dust.
Julis!
Julis!
Julis!
So that is the miasma of Erenshkigal.
Are you Ayato Amagiri?
You have already won!
This is enough!
It is very sad,
but even I cannot stop the wheels of fate once they start turning.
If you do not want to get dragged into this, you should leave right now.
Sorry, but that is just not going to happen.
What a pity.
Amagiri Shinmei Style...
Repulsing Crow!
So that is the Ser=Versta.
To be honest, I feel like I have zero chance of beating you.
No way!
I see...
Tasteless, odorless, colorless, transparent miasma, huh?
Pretty mind-blowing...
I am sorry.
But you will be out of your misery soon.
I wonder if you would be so kind as to hold off a bit, young miss?
The thing is, I have been hired to take out those two myself.
And I get paid on a per head basis.
If you do not mind, could you possibly let me have that prey?
Hey, Ophelia...
Where the hell have you been fooling around?
Which part of do not leave the lab do not you get?
I will be heading back now.
Do as you wish.
I am truly grateful.
Hold up!
Really, I have to say that was bone-chilling.
I have heard stories about her,
but I never thought she was a monster of that level.
Heaven forbid!
Now then, why do not I take care of my own business, then?
Allow me to introduce you.
These are my creations, Orthrus and Cerberus.
What do you think?
Are not they as imposing as their legends describe them?
Not good.
Amagiri Shinmei Style, First Sword...
Fugaku!
There is our Phoenix Festa champ.
However...
This...
I cannot evade!
Sorry to keep you waiting, Ayato.
That was a close shave, was not it?
Claudia!
Well, well,
this is quite a dilemma.
Who knew I would be thwarted like this?
What would you like to do, Gustave Marlowe?
I would not mind taking you on now myself...
but that is not what you want, is it?
I see, you are an annoyingly smart young lady, are not you?
Although this is a golden opportunity,
I am not going to push it and shall now withdraw.
Ayato?
Are you all right?
Ayato!
Ayato!
Oh, woe is me!
These previews that you have all enjoyed until now...
We have now reached the very last one!
However!
Please do not be sad!
Episode 24 Reunion
In the next episode, the one true heroine will finally be left standing!
And the victor will of course be...
